meanings.sent1: Her circumspections before making a decision always ensured a positive outcome.
meanings.sent2: It is important to practice circumspections when dealing with important matters.
meanings.sent3: His circumspections were so extreme that he took hours to choose a flavor of ice cream.
meanings.sent4: In the game of chess, every move requires circumspections to avoid losing.
meanings.sent5: The detective's circumspections led to solving the mysterious case.
